message.body: I know diagnosing cf in a 2-month-old is premature but i'm gonna take a wild guess and say fire-she just cracked up laughing outta the blue!

Love it! I just figured out Jason is water then earth! All about his needs, refuses to be helped, seeks to be safe and nourished! The groan and sing and blue and ripe yellowy colors leap out at me now!!!!
Ur getting so good at this!

Sometimes!!! :) You really have to LOOK and use your senses and body rather than behavior. Jason is not white; he's a delicious ripe brown and blue! But for children and animals behavior works good! Laura's dog Maggie is a fire cf according to Laura. She
I helped Noah order the diapers and we got her lavender ones! She swooshed them around and wagged her butt alot! Then she magically stopped being incontinent soon after!!!
It was crazy. Maybe she just wanted diapers for awhile or maybe it was just a passing bladder thing.
